meanings.sent1: The pst of the falling snow was soothing.
meanings.sent2: I heard a pst coming from the bushes.
meanings.sent3: The cat made a pst noise while sneaking up on its toy.
meanings.sent4: The pst of the wind through the trees was like a gentle whisper.
meanings.sent5: The pst of the leaves underfoot was like a secret being shared.

meanings.definition: A unit of pressure equal to one pound per square inch.
meanings.sent1: The tire pressure was measured in pst.
meanings.sent2: He checked the pst of the gas tank before the trip.
meanings.sent3: The balloon popped due to too much pst inside.
meanings.sent4: The pst in the water pipe was causing a leak.
meanings.sent5: The pst on the gauge showed the engine was running smoothly.

meanings.definition: An abbreviation for Pacific Standard Time.
meanings.sent1: The webinar starts at 9 am pst.
meanings.sent2: She always calls her family at 6 pm pst.
meanings.sent3: I missed the meeting because I forgot about the pst.
meanings.sent4: Living in a different time zone made me appreciate pst.
meanings.sent5: The flight departure time was listed in pst for clarity.
